title: Elegant vintage(?) fonts
content:
Hello everyone,

I´m looking for an elegant, sophisticated font to use in a design.

I found two examples but I´ve no idea which fonts are being used here. If you know the name of these fonts or if you have any suggestions for similar fonts, I´d love to hear them.

Many thanks for your help,  
Matthias

Examples:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804163034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo-HNY_5915.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804163034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-marabans_3514.png)
author: Mattvic

comments.content:
HOTEL NEW YORK | ROTTERDAM: [Bank Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804163034/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/bank+gothic)  
MARABANS: [Copperplate](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804163034/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/copperplate)  
COFFEE & TEA: [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804163034/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/din)
